website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking stainless steel sink that can help turn your utility area into something more attractive.
pros: An under-mount sink that looks sharp with your laundry countertop
A reasonable price for the quality
Depth on the sink is good
Bottom grate helps to protect the sink
cons: This sink is not as big as other utility sinks available

customer_reviews.title: Ruvati one bowl sink
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sink as part of a laundry room remodel. We initially had a plastic freestanding laundry tub, which did get a lot of use, but looked terrible since that room serves as the side entrance to our home. The sink is really great looking, and it's extra deep, which makes it perfect to bathe our dogs in. It can also be under mounted or over mounted, though we chose over mounted because of the wood counters.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: Great for a variety of purposes not just as a laundry sink.
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice sink. I bought it to use in a basement wet bar. We had it undermounted to granite by a granite countertop company and did the rest of it (drain, trap, faucet) ourselves. I love how deep the sink is as I sometimes dabble in winemaking and need a big deep sink to clean that equipment. Attached are some pictures, some of which show a tape measure so you can gauge the dimensions. I would recommend this sink for wet bar use -- it's good for much more than just a laundry/utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: Trafalgar

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big!
customer_reviews.text: Using this sink in the laundry room. Installed as a drop in and so far working great. Yes there is a little water left on bottom and leaves spots when dried but I'm going to try the wax method to see if that helps. Seems durable and well built. Large enough to wash my 20lb Boston Terrier. I like how it looks and cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great sink - great value.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sink! This is a great sink - heavy duty, deep and very attractive. Price is very reasonable given the quality of the product. Comes incredibly well packaged - not a ding or dent on it. If you're looking for either a deep kitchen sink or a utility room sink that doesn't look like a utility room sink - buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Trail

customer_reviews.title: The grate protects the bottom of the sink very effectively and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this sink as part of a kitchen/laundry room remodel. It's modern cut matches perfectly with our updated decor and it is deep enough to be a very effective utility sink. Form and function! The straight sides make it feel even larger than it actually is, as traditional sinks this size have "sloped sides" which make it more difficult to get large items all the way in to the sink. The grate protects the bottom of the sink very effectively and is easy to clean. Love this sink!
customer_reviews.author: RT-1

customer_reviews.title: Well built, great accessories included
customer_reviews.text: Thick steel and great accessories make this an outstanding bargain for a large sink. With the drain included, it’s another reason to make this purchase. I used it in a laundry room and the steel grate at the bottom has come in handy to leave items drying in the sink. It was installed as an undermount so I don’t see the edges but I’m sure they’ll looks fine if mounted above the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Wibbs

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Every corner of this sink arrived bent. Since it was an under mount and I was under pressure to get the job done I decided to bend the corners back myself. It wasn't perfect, but being under mount it was hidden. I expect to receive a product that is not damaged and that doest waste my time... :-(
customer_reviews.author: CarlosECarlos

customer_reviews.title: Laundry room sink
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 sinks before I had finally ordered this one. I had to return the prior ones as they were not "TRUE" Utility/laundry room sinks even though they indicated they were. This sink is very nice and looks lovely in my remodeled laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: Just had our plumber install this sink. So far, so good. December 3, 2017: I initially reviewed this product right after we received it. It now has been about 5 months, and I'd just like to say that this is really a lovely sink. We have it installed in our laundry room, but it certainly could be used in a kitchen. Everything about it seems to be well made and first quality. I would certainly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Sink
customer_reviews.text: I installed this sink in my laundry room. Previously I had a really ugly and small sink that was top mounted on cultured marble. When we re-did our kitchen counter tops we decided to go ahead and re-do the one in the laundry room as well. We installed a Silestone countertop in Soapstone Suede finish and the Ruvati Sink. Although we had some setbacks in the kitchen the Ruvati utility sink gets an A+! Great value for the $$$. AT
customer_reviews.author: Anita Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We used this sink as an undermount in a remodel project in our laundry room. Very heavy duty, quiet, and an easy install. We love the squared inside edges and it is a great updated look. I highly recommend rubbing down the inside with a stainless steel spot reducer due to the size and depth of the sink - doesn't work well to wipe down the inside every use, and otherwise it spots. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Soro

customer_reviews.title: This thing is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We’re really impressed with this sink. Sure wish I had picked out a kitchen sink that looked this good. We just put quartz countertops in the laundry room and replaced the leaky faucet and old plastic tub with this. Gorgeous! Now I’ll need to include the laundry room on the house tour!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Man I love this sink and included base rack!
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! Very deep to accommodate buckets for utility use or dinner wear if used for kitchen. It's a nice size and the included drain and base rack are awesome. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Just Luck

customer_reviews.title: Love the depth!
customer_reviews.text: We are just finishing an upgrade in our laundry room with this sink. It is exactly what I wanted because it's deep and it should out perform the old plastic material that was originally installed. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: mzkitti

customer_reviews.title: Heavy gauge steel, perfect size for laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Laundry Room remodel: We purchased this sink for our laundry room and it was installed on Friday. We have not used it yet. We are very happy with the purchase. Our contractor was impressed with the high quality of the sink and the quartz installers also commented on the beauty of the sink. We have to wait to use it until our backsplash and faucet have been installed. Can’t wait to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink
customer_reviews.text: Very deep and well made. The first one arrived damaged but Amazon replaced it immediately. These are the best stainless steel sinks on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our utility room sink with this. Truly a major upgrade for a very reasonable amount of money. The sink is really nicely finished, has an elegant shape and came with an excellent drain and well made grate. The thickness of the stainless gives it a very solid feel. I would highly recommend this sink.
customer_reviews.author: srj

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots
customer_reviews.text: I had the sink installed a few weeks now and rust spots have already appeared. I use bar keepers cleanser to remove it, but it should not be rusting. I assumed this was quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Only have had it installed for a week, but love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: This will be in our laundry room and fits our needs perfectly. Great quality at a good price and it include the protective rack for the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Deep sink
customer_reviews.text: excellent sink. Very deep. Corner are pretty acute, so a little hard to get into to clean. The strainer into the drain is very handy - catches garbage from going down drain.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: Heavy gage steel (16 gage I believe). Well made, expertly packed. Arrived in great condition. Top quality product. Nice polished interior finish. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stanalar

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel sinks
customer_reviews.text: This sinks are fantastic The only thing I would do I would make the corners on the bottom of the sinks a little bit more round for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Tonypdxi

customer_reviews.title: Once got the correct size, it’s great!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the used one because we’re on a budget for our new house... cut counter to dimensions on the box, this one is mislabeled. We returned and bought the same one but new, and it fit perfect! AMAZON please let the company know that this return is mislabeled!! Other one looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: and very nice looking. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This Ruvati sink is very well made, and very nice looking. Highly recommend. I started with the laundry room in case I didn't like it, but I love it. Going to order 4 more for kitchens and a bar. The sink is very heavy, and it comes in super sound packaging. It arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: lifarm

customer_reviews.title: Great deep sink for laundry room
customer_reviews.text: It’s a large beautiful utility sink for the laundry room. It’s 16 gage SS with a dampening coating. With the rack and basket drain it’s a great buy..
customer_reviews.author: SAK

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink was just what we were looking for in our laundry room. The price was fair and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: T Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great sink.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking. Love the rack in the bottom and the drain design. Buy a regular sink faucet with pull out for easiest cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: LR3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.....I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about ordering this type of item online, but when it arrived even the packaging exceeded my expectations. I love the sink, it is the perfect size and the accesories that it came with are not included with some of the other popular brands. Not only is this sink a good value it is gorgeous. Even my contractor wanted to know where I ordered it. Thank you Ruvati !
customer_reviews.author: SundanceKid

customer_reviews.title: New laundry room sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is awesome! I purchased this sink for a facelift of my laundry room. We replaced the sink, the countertop and faucet. We kept the original cabinet so we needed a deep stainless steel sink to replace the deep ceramic sink. I looked and looked and only this one fit the bill. It looks so good in my laundry look. I got so many compliments on it and even my contractor loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Y.

customer_reviews.title: Used item came with dent on mounting lip.
customer_reviews.text: The sink is gorgeous. I took the chance and bought an used item. It stated that the package will be damaged. Well the sink is also lightly damaged on one corner. I am waiting for the installer guy to tell me if it is OK to mount under granite counter top. This is the reason for taking 2 stars. Otherwise sink is stunning should receive 6 stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Versatility. Wash hands clean veggies, paint brushes and the dog. Nice and deep, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sink damaged
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived in a damaged state. A corner was bent. Fortunately my fabricator was able to straighten it and make it work. Not sure how it will perform, but we hope it will work well. The sink in general looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Best I sink I found!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is outstanding along with the packaging, price and customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a deep sink to use for my "redo" of our New Laundry room. This sink was not only deep at 12", but it was built and finished amazingly for the price. I'd recommend that sink to anyone! It really is the BOMB!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McGill

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this sink
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this in our laundry room. Very nice clean lines. We use a faucet with a good sprayer as flat bottom sinks need a little extra flushing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and quality merchandise
customer_reviews.text: The product I received from Ruvati was top-notch quality. It was a 12 inch deep laundry room sink that fits my puppy's perfectly. Great customer service and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Chait

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sink is very nice looking and good quality. I like the look of the drain and I like the removable grate for the bottom of the sink to prevent scratching. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Compared specs on this sink to others from more brand recognized companies (Elkay, Kohler, etc.) and was pleasantly surprised to find that Ruvati puts as much quality into their sinks at a much lower cost to the consumer. I wish I had known about Ruvati before I did my kitchen! This was for our laundry room - love the sink!
customer_reviews.author: B Roy

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! We purchased it for use in our laundry room and couldn’t be happier. The plumber who installed it even asked where we got it as it is so different from what you typically find in the big box stores. The depth is excellent and the quality superb. It fits great as an under mount under our granite counter. We highly recommend this sink!
customer_reviews.author: Anne R

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, great company
customer_reviews.text: Great sink! Looks beautiful mounted under the sink. It includes a really nice basket style drain. The customer service is prompt and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: szum

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is great! Perfect size and shape, and especially love how deep it is. Looks great in our newly remodeled mudroom. The sink was packaged extremely well and arrived in perfect condition. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sink. Nice and deep and solid feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Niles

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Our sink was installed yesterday. The packaging was impeccable. The sink is a great size and includes a removable trap within the drain and a grate to protect the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great utility sink
customer_reviews.text: beautiful sink. installed without any problems. we use it as a laundry sink. very happy with Ruvati. We also have a larger Ruvati sink in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Master

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and construction of this sink. We installed in our rooftop bar and it fits and looks perfectly. High quality and sturdy sink! Would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Eichler

customer_reviews.title: Deep and well made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Deep and the perfect size for our laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H. Green

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy sink. Easy installation and came with strainer and rack for inside sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new sinks and the extra parts that came with it! First class! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Merri Mullens Willis

customer_reviews.title: Size and strength
customer_reviews.text: Everything, how well protected the sink was in the packaging, the strength of the sink, and how well the box became an airplane for my 3yo daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert fortune

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Weird to say this, but the sink is beautiful. We are very happy with the quality and especially proud that it was made in the USA 🇺🇸!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very attractive and love the rack in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: farkle1

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and is exactly what we were looking for. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMap

customer_reviews.title: Too nice for a laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This sink is so deep I can give my dog a bath . The sink looks too nice for a laundry room. Cleans up easily. I also have the 45” Ruvati in my kitchen . My favorite part of renovation.
customer_reviews.author: Gronko

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a well built sink that looks good. Seems very solid and I like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: never assume people are doing their job
customer_reviews.text: Building a house went to install and sink mesh protector was missing sooo frustrating. And 2 days past 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Picanso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink!
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed beautiful deep well sink. Came in very nice and product supportive packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S Rozier

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sink!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we were looking for.. We wanted a deep stainless steel sink for our Laundry room and we got it. Really nice sink!
customer_reviews.author: Preston L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: I received the sink today and it is beautiful. I can't wait to see it installed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s deep amd perfect for washing clothes or any big pots
customer_reviews.author: MARICEL SERRANO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for laundry
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in the laundry room and deep enough for a bucket
customer_reviews.author: Irene BLaess

customer_reviews.title: This one's a keeper...
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT laundry room deep sink. You'll look far & wide trying to find another one that is built to this quality, and for an excellent price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

product_meta.title: Ruvati 23" x 18" x 12" Deep Laundry Utility Sink Undermount 16 Gauge Stainless Steel - RVU6100
feature_bullets: 16 Gauge premium T-304 Grade Stainless Steel (18/10 Chromium/Nickel)

12-inch Deep Bowls - Perfect as a Laundry or Utility Sink | Luxurious Brushed Finish - Matches stainless steel appliances and hides scratches | Sloped bottom with drain grooves for complete water drainage
Heavy duty sound guard padding and undercoating to minimize noise | Zero Radius - sharp inside corners for a resolutely modern look
Exterior Dimensions: 23" (wide) x 18" (front-to-back) | Interior Dimensions: 21" (wide) x 16" (front-to-back) x 12" (bowl depth) | Standard 3.5 inch drain opening
Included in box: Sink, Bottom Rinse Grid, Basket Strainer Drain, Cutout Template, Mounting Clips and Installation Guide | Limited Lifetime Warranty - Ruvati USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
